special_text:
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create a 1/1 colorless Soldier artifact creature token.
[+1]: Create a 0/0 colorless Construct artifact creature token with “This creature gets +1/+1 for each artifact you control.”
[-2]: Draw two cards, then you may tap three untapped artifacts you control. If you do, you gain 1 life for each card in your hand.
[-3]: Exchange control of target artifact you control and target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls.
